summary: Moments is a mobile-first React + TypeScript single-page app for planning small real-world moments (via a weekly calendar strip and “Plan a Moment” bottom sheet) and capturing private photo memories (camera → save confirmation → feeling check). The app is primarily local-first (planned moments, photo moments, user profile, and notifications stored in browser storage) with reactive UI updates via storage listeners and custom DOM events. It integrates Dfinity Internet Identity for authentication and includes a Motoko backend canister with role-based access control (admin bootstrap via environment token) plus profile/settings and photo APIs with blob storage wiring.

existing_features.title: Client-side routing across app screens
existing_features.description: Defines routes for splash (/), welcome (/welcome), home (/home), camera (/camera), save moment confirmation (/save-moment), feeling check (/feeling-check), calendar (/calendar), vault (/vault), vault detail (/vault/$momentId), profile (/profile), and settings (/settings).

existing_features.title: React Query provider setup
existing_features.description: Initializes a shared QueryClient and wraps the app to enable cached queries and shared invalidation patterns.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook
existing_features.description: Manages identity hydration on mount, login/logout, and exposes status flags (initializing/idle/logging-in/success/loginError) plus error state.

existing_features.title: Backend actor creation and caching per principal
existing_features.description: Creates anonymous or authenticated backend actors depending on Internet Identity state, caches them with React Query keyed by principal, and triggers backend access-control initialization using a secret token from the URL hash.

existing_features.title: Secure secret parameter extraction from URL hash with session persistence and scrubbing
existing_features.description: Utilities to extract sensitive parameters from the URL hash fragment, persist them in sessionStorage, and scrub them from the address bar via history.replaceState.

existing_features.title: Mobile-first fixed viewport frame layout
existing_features.description: Pages render within a centered viewport constrained to typical mobile dimensions with a full-screen backdrop for consistent layout across devices.

existing_features.title: Animated onboarding splash slideshow (3 slides)
existing_features.description: Implements a 3-slide onboarding experience with long-duration 3D enter/exit transitions, autoplay progression, and Prev/Next navigation controls.

existing_features.title: Splash cards support video and image media with preloading
existing_features.description: Splash cards can render an autoplaying, muted looping video (playsInline) or eager-loaded images; index.html preloads splash assets for instant display.

existing_features.title: Auth-aware onboarding CTA (Sign In / Continue) and auto-navigation
existing_features.description: Final onboarding slide CTA adapts to auth state: shows Loading/Connecting, triggers login when unauthenticated, continues to /welcome when authenticated, and auto-navigates to /welcome if already authenticated on slide 3.

existing_features.title: Welcome page with entrance animations
existing_features.description: Animated welcome card matching onboarding motion language; provides Get Started CTA routing to /home.

existing_features.title: Home planning dashboard with weekly strip, planning CTA, planned-moment list, and bottom navigation
existing_features.description: Home shows logo header, a search input stub, a weekly calendar strip, a planning CTA (Start Planning / +), and a list of planned moments. Includes a floating bottom navigation bar that hides while the planner sheet is open.

existing_features.title: Home weekly calendar strip with week navigation and planned-day filled pills
existing_features.description: Renders a Sunday-start week row with prev/next week arrows; planned dates are shown as color-filled pills using dateColorMap, and selecting a booked day uses that same planned color instead of default black styling.

existing_features.title: Home layout spacing refinement for more room for planned-moment cards
existing_features.description: Adjusts Home spacing to position the weekly calendar strip slightly higher and create more vertical space for planned-moment cards below.

existing_features.title: Planner bottom sheet for creating planned moments
existing_features.description: Slide-up bottom sheet (~75vh) with open/close animations, required time picker, optional title, native date-picker reschedule support, and save/cancel actions. Automatically assigns a deterministic date-based color when saving and keeps the sheet open on duplicate-date errors.

existing_features.title: Planned moments local persistence (CRUD) with reactive updates
existing_features.description: Stores planned moments in localStorage with generated IDs and createdAt timestamps; supports create, delete, load, get-by-date, date set/color map helpers, and publishes same-tab change events plus cross-tab storage subscriptions.

existing_features.title: Deterministic date→color assignment for planned moments
existing_features.description: Uses a muted OKLCH palette and a deterministic hash of ISO date strings to consistently map each date to a color across sessions (used in calendar strip and plan styling).

existing_features.title: One planned moment per day enforcement
existing_features.description: savePlannedMoment rejects saving another plan on the same ISO date with a 'duplicate-date' error; UI surfaces a friendly toast and keeps the bottom sheet open.

existing_features.title: Planned moment pill card UI with share/delete actions
existing_features.description: Renders planned moments as pill-shaped transparent cards with a thin border colored by the moment/date color, a left color dot with a black ring, and in-card share + trash actions.

existing_features.title: Clipboard-based planned moment sharing
existing_features.description: Generates formatted share text for planned moments (date/time/title + optional profile display name) and copies it to clipboard using Clipboard API with textarea/document.execCommand fallback; shows toast feedback.

existing_features.title: Planned moment deletion with confirmation modal
existing_features.description: Provides an in-app confirm/cancel modal before deleting a planned moment from localStorage.

existing_features.title: Inline toast notifications
existing_features.description: Reusable toast with auto-dismiss and fade/slide transitions; supports bottom or side placement for feedback such as copy success or duplicate-date warnings.

existing_features.title: Calendar page weekly view with planned/photo indicators and planner integration
existing_features.description: Displays a weekly date strip with week and month navigation; indicates planned moments and photo moments by checking local storage; opens the planner bottom sheet on date selection and supports rescheduling via native date picker.

existing_features.title: Browser camera hook (stream lifecycle + capture)
existing_features.description: Encapsulates camera support detection, getUserMedia constraints, stream cleanup, facing-mode switching, retry, and photo capture via canvas→Blob→File with configurable quality/format.

existing_features.title: Camera capture/review flow with gallery upload
existing_features.description: Provides live preview, capture/retake, switch camera, optional gallery upload, and advances to the save confirmation screen after storing a session draft of the captured image.

existing_features.title: Session draft storage for camera → confirm → feeling flow
existing_features.description: Stores captured photo draft, confirmation inputs, and the saved moment ID in sessionStorage; supports clearing draft on retake/completion.

existing_features.title: Save moment confirmation screen (who + reflection)
existing_features.description: Shows captured photo, allows selecting who and entering an optional reflection, saves the moment to localStorage, stores the moment ID for follow-up, and routes to the feeling check screen.

existing_features.title: Post-save feeling check-in for a moment
existing_features.description: Prompts “How did this feel?” with Meaningful/Good/Okay options, updates the saved moment record with the selected feeling, clears the session draft, then routes back to /home.

existing_features.title: Local photo moments storage utilities
existing_features.description: Stores photo moments in localStorage (id, data URL, timestamp, MIME type, who, reflection, feeling) and provides load/update/get-by-id helpers; emits a same-tab update event on writes.

existing_features.title: Photo moments hook with reactive refresh
existing_features.description: Loads all photo moments and the most recent photo, refreshing on storage events filtered by key and a custom moments_photos_updated event for same-tab updates.

existing_features.title: Vault gallery grouped by month with animated thumbnail grid
existing_features.description: Groups photo moments by month/year, shows a 3-column thumbnail grid (limited to 6 per month) with entrance animations and optional feeling badges; navigates to per-moment view.

existing_features.title: Vault moment detail viewer with metadata overlay
existing_features.description: Full-screen moment viewer with close/back control and bottom gradient overlay showing relative time, who, reflection, and feeling.

existing_features.title: IntersectionObserver in-view hook
existing_features.description: Reusable hook to detect when elements enter the viewport with configurable threshold/rootMargin and trigger-once behavior (used for Vault animations).

existing_features.title: Relative time formatting utility
existing_features.description: Formats timestamps into compact relative labels (seconds/minutes/hours/days) and falls back to a short date for older moments.

existing_features.title: Local-first profile storage with invite code generation
existing_features.description: Stores user profile data in localStorage, ensures an invite code exists (generating one if missing), and emits a profile_updated event on save.

existing_features.title: Auto-geolocation hook (once per session)
existing_features.description: Requests browser geolocation at most once per session when profile location/coordinates are missing; calls onSuccess with coordinates on grant and logs errors without throwing.

existing_features.title: Profile state hook with reactive updates
existing_features.description: Manages profile state, persists updates to localStorage, auto-requests geolocation when needed, and refreshes on storage/profile_updated events.

existing_features.title: Profile management screen
existing_features.description: Edits display name/location, supports profile photo upload (FileReader→data URL), copies invite code to clipboard with fallback, shows toast feedback, and navigates to Settings or Home.

existing_features.title: Settings screen with logout
existing_features.description: Settings UI with grouped placeholder items and a logout action that clears Internet Identity state and routes to the splash screen (/).

existing_features.title: Backend RBAC with admin bootstrap secret
existing_features.description: Motoko RBAC supports roles (#admin/#user/#guest), initialization via env var CAFFEINE_ADMIN_TOKEN plus a user-provided token, admin-only role assignment, and endpoints to query caller role/admin status.

existing_features.title: Backend user profile API with authorization checks
existing_features.description: Stores user profiles keyed by Principal; authenticated users can read/save their own profile and admins can read other users’ profiles.

existing_features.title: Backend user settings API with authorization checks
existing_features.description: Stores per-user settings keyed by Principal; requires authenticated user role for read/write.

existing_features.title: Backend photo metadata registry per user (index only)
existing_features.description: Maintains a per-user list of photo metadata records (id/owner/timestamp/blobId) with authenticated store/list and owner-only delete behavior; blob persistence is not yet implemented.

existing_features.title: Backend blob-storage maintenance and authorization endpoints (mixin)
existing_features.description: Exposes endpoints to update authorized gateway principals, check blob liveness, list dead blobs for deletion (authorized callers), confirm deletion + trigger GC, create an upload certificate stub, and refill cycles via a cashier principal.

existing_features.title: Reserved module for future backend query hooks
existing_features.description: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks that interact with the backend; currently exports nothing.

existing_features.title: Hamburger menu component with app navigation/actions
existing_features.description: Implements the previously-empty HamburgerMenu component to provide a functional in-app menu for navigation and/or common actions.

existing_features.title: Sign-in overlay component for authentication UX
existing_features.description: Implements the previously-empty SignInOverlay component to support an in-app sign-in prompt/overlay tied to Internet Identity authentication state.

existing_features.title: Moments page implementation
existing_features.description: Implements the previously-empty MomentsPage route to render its intended UI instead of being an unimplemented placeholder.

existing_features.title: Backend photo blob persistence and blob retrieval wired
existing_features.description: Completes backend wiring so photo uploads persist the provided blob into blob storage and blob retrieval is implemented (getBlob no longer returns a constant null placeholder). Also corrects photo metadata timestamp handling during storePhoto.

existing_features.title: Local notifications storage utilities with reactive updates
existing_features.description: Stores notifications locally (including read/unread state and received timestamps), provides CRUD helpers, and triggers same-tab and cross-tab reactive refresh via custom events and storage listeners.

existing_features.title: Floating notification chat-bubble popups near logo
existing_features.description: Displays small, auto-dismissing chat-bubble notification popups near the Moments logo; uses the current character/avatar image and reads from locally stored notifications.

existing_features.title: Notifications inbox page with unread badge and timestamps
existing_features.description: Adds a dedicated Notifications inbox screen that lists notifications with received timestamps and supports unread count badge display from local storage (in addition to floating popups).

existing_features.title: Consistent back-navigation slide transition across routes
existing_features.description: Implements a consistent slide transition animation when navigating back (history pop / back action) to smooth route changes across the app.

existing_features.title: Onboarding splash updates (slide removal + updated Get Started video media)
existing_features.description: Updates the onboarding/splash sequence to remove the “capture every moment” slide and updates the Get Started slide media to use the provided video with intended scaling/fit behavior.

existing_features.title: Navbar cleanup and notifications icon styling update
existing_features.description: Updates the bottom navbar to remove/replace the calendar icon and uses react-icons BsFillBellFill for notifications with default black styling and yellow hover/active styling to match the app’s icon style; aligns notifications navigation/UI behavior with intended usage.

existing_features.title: Duplicate-date error toast rendered within phone frame and styled as compact red warning
existing_features.description: Ensures the duplicate-date warning toast appears within the mobile phone frame viewport (not off-screen) and is styled as a small red in-app warning.

existing_features.title: Moment viewer no longer exposes delete controls
existing_features.description: Removes the delete option entirely from the moment/image viewer UI so no delete controls are shown while viewing a moment.

architectural_notes: Frontend is a React + TypeScript SPA using TanStack Router for navigation and TanStack React Query for shared caching (notably backend actor caching keyed by principal).
UI is mobile-first and consistently rendered inside a centered phone-sized viewport (max ~390×844) over a full-screen backdrop to preserve a mobile layout on desktop.
Styling uses Tailwind utilities plus extensive custom CSS (OKLCH design tokens, custom animations for onboarding, bottom sheets, modals, and toasts).
Local-first persistence: planned moments, photo moments, and profile are stored in localStorage; the capture flow uses sessionStorage for draft state between screens.
Same-tab data reactivity is implemented via custom DOM events (e.g., plannedMomentsChanged, moments_photos_updated, profile_updated) in addition to the browser storage event for cross-tab updates.

Authentication is provided via a custom Internet Identity context/provider built on AuthClient; actor creation is identity-aware and initialized with an admin secret read from the URL hash (scrubbed after extraction).

Backend is a Motoko canister composed via mixins (authorization + blob-storage maintenance endpoints). RBAC is first-user-admin bootstrapped via env var CAFFEINE_ADMIN_TOKEN and a user-provided secret.

Repository now includes a reusable build-template scaffold (React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui + ICP canister YAMLs) with deploy/build scripts (Dockerfile, icp.yaml, deploy.sh) and asset maintenance utilities (resize/prune images).

Notifications are local-first: notifications are persisted in browser storage with unread state and timestamps, surfaced via floating chat-bubble popups near the logo and a dedicated inbox page with unread badge; updates propagate via storage listeners and custom events.
Back-navigation (history pop) transitions are handled via a dedicated hook (useBackSlideNavigation) to apply consistent slide animations on route back actions.
known_issues: Two global CSS entrypoints exist (frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css). The app imports frontend/src/index.css via src/main.tsx; the other file can drift and cause confusion.
CameraScreen flash toggle is UI-only; the camera hook does not implement torch/flash control.
Backend canister state (maps/counters/roles) is not stable; data will be lost on upgrade without stable variables and preupgrade/postupgrade handling.
backend/blob-storage/Storage.mo references env var CAFFFEINE_STORAGE_CASHIER_PRINCIPAL (likely misspelled), increasing deployment misconfiguration risk.
backend/blob-storage/Storage.mo refillCashier computes Nat.sub(currentBalance, reservedCycles); if currentBalance < reservedCycles this can trap due to Nat underflow.
authorization/access-control.mo traps for unregistered users in getUserRole; callers must ensure initialization occurs for new principals before permission checks.
Local storage can become full; current UX does not allow users to delete existing stored items to recover space.
Deployments intermittently fail; requires investigation of build/deploy pipeline stability (redeploy often fails even without code changes).
